titleStmt.title: An olive-leaf: or, Some peaceable considerations to the Christian meeting at Christs-Church in London, Munday, Jan. 9. 1653. Also, the reign of Christ, and the saints with him, on earth, a thousand yeers, one day, and the day at hand. By William Erbery.
titleStmt.author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.

titleStmt.title: An olive-leaf: or, Some peaceable considerations to the Christian meeting at Christs-Church in London, Munday, Jan. 9. 1653. Also, the reign of Christ, and the saints with him, on earth, a thousand yeers, one day, and the day at hand. By William Erbery.
titleStmt.author: Erbery, William, 1604-1654.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy E.726[5]: "Jan: 12 1653"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out; on E.729[10]: "Feb: 14"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "3".
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
Appears at reel 726 (E.726[5]), and at reel 729 (E.729[10]).
